import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './../ProfileCard/ProfileCard.css' import profilePage from '../../Pages/Profile/Profile' const serverPublic = process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_FOLDER; const ProfileCard = ({location}) => { const {user} =useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData) const {post} = useSelector((state)=>state.postReducer) return (
{user.firstname} {user.lastname} {user.worksAt ?user.worksAt:"Write About Yourself"}
{user.following.length} Followings
{user.followers.length} Followers
{location == Profile &&( <>
3 Posts
)}
{location ===Profile? '': My Profile }
) } export default ProfileCard
